data.message:
Hello, i write this message to you because i need help from your company, how can you help me. i have a problem my girlfriend Facebook account (account name: Neath Neath now changed to khmer zer fc ) was hacked by someone and all contact information were change also including password email, this changing maybe on August 19, 2017 time 6:00 PM, time in Cambodia. now i and my girlfriend are worry about security, and worry about hacker use this account to do bad things. because i have seen hacker sometime online this account, and i try chat to him or her but he/her doesn't reply. 
Now this Facebook id account is ( https://www.facebook.com/larak.ratha). i hope you can deal this problem for me. thank you so much.

replies.message: Hi Sorn. If your girlfriend's account was taken over by someone else, please have her follow these steps to secure it: http://bit.ly/2wLn9P5. Thanks! -Caitlin
